channel.title: So I accidentally found a thing
channel.description: I´ve been checking [url]https://www.bmrf.us[/url] in weekly basis for a long time and now it´s down. Then I stumbled into [url='https://isblackmesareleased.com/']this[/url]. Guess we have a release date now. :thumbsup:

item.title: So I accidentally found a thing
item.dc:creator: RedEye
item.description:
Nonimportantuser:

Did a whois lookup on it. Its not official as its not registered to any member of the team.

A developer has already responded saying as much.
WHOIS does not work on that site because the domain’s privacy is protected by domainprivacygroup.com, so there is no way you can tell who registered it.

Read full topic
item.source: So I accidentally found a thing

item.title: So I accidentally found a thing

item.description:
The first giveaway is that Valve and Steam are not mentioned on the bottom.

item.title: So I accidentally found a thing
item.dc:creator: chenmozx
item.description:
This countdown is pointing to 31th, December, the final day of 2017, so we can’t get definite information from it. Just wait for the official announcement.

item.title: So I accidentally found a thing
item.dc:creator: Kaltsu
item.description:
TextFAMGUY1:

I don’t think this is related to us. It may be third party, or a test site Hubi was working on. It’s not accurate, at any rate!

Yeah, should´ve realized something this random wouldn´t probably be legit. It just seemed so well made that I thought it was real… But what´s with bmrf.us, though?

Read full topic
